creator: steve.downey@netfolio.com
text:
'\' isn't getting converted to '/' when going from file system name space to 
URI name space, leading to a stack underflow error in baseDirStack.peek() in 
ParserController.java

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text:
jspc didn't work well under windows since file separator assumed to be "/" in
ParserController.resolveFileName. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.

creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
text: *** Bug 487 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: tilo.christ@med.siemens.de
text:
This bug has not been fixed or there is a regression. It is still there in 4.0 
Beta 7.

jspc:
     [java] 2001-08-30 02:39:12 - ERROR-the file '\ui\table\SimpleTable.en.jsp'
generated the following general exception: java.util.EmptyStackException
     [java] java.util.EmptyStackException
     [java]     at java.util.Stack.peek(Unknown Source)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.resolveFileName(P
arserController.java:419)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.compiler.ParserController.parse(ParserContr
oller.java:187)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.compiler.Compiler.compile(Compiler.java:210
)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.JspC.parseFile(JspC.java:385)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.JspC.parseFiles(JspC.java:651)
     [java]     at org.apache.jasper.JspC.main(JspC.java:699)

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I put in another fix. Please confirm the bug is fixed. The regression was 
introduced when removing some hacks which caused problems.
I tested against nightly build 20010903 and the problem is fixed.
creator: tilo.christ@med.siemens.de
